EmailTemplate.description: The Product manager Recommendation have been updated for a project
EmailTemplate.name: Product Manager Recommendation changes - Project Tracker
EmailTemplate.subject: Product Manager Recommendation for Project {!Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c} is {!Project_Tracker__c.Product_Manager_Recommendation__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Project {!NullValue(Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c, "product manager recommendations is {!Project_Tracker__c.Product_Manager_Recommendation__c")}
The link to the project details :{!Project_Tracker__c.Link} Thanks,
{!Project_Tracker__c.OwnerFullName}
